CustomField.description: Used in the "NI_CendynOrders" Apex Class. The value in this field is used to calculate the Opportunity Closed Date date range. The query looks at the current date and subtracts the number of months from the current date to get the start date for the Closed Date date range. Opportunities will be returned where the Closed Date is greater than or equal to this date.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Used in the "NI_CendynOrders" Apex Class. The value in this field is used to calculate the Opportunity Closed Date date range.
CustomField.label: Opp Close Date Months
